name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Whatsapp Web Privacy Plus - Hide & Lock

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Secure your Whatsapp Web. Enhance Privacy

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your privacy on WhatsApp™ Web with Whatsapp Web Privacy Plus - Hide & Lock Extension. 
1) Your messages remain hidden until you hover over them, adding an extra layer of confidentiality in public settings.

Tailor the extension to suit your preferences. Choose which elements to blur with ease:

- Chat Messages: Keep your conversations private by blurring all messages within the chat.
- Message Previews: Conceal recent message previews on the left sidebar for added discretion.
- Media Content: Blur images, videos, stickers, and other media independently from text, maintaining your privacy.
- Profile Pictures: Hide profile pictures to ensure anonymity across the platform.

2) In addition to enhancing your privacy, our extension offers advanced security features to safeguard your WhatsApp™ experience:

- Screen Lock: Secure your WhatsApp™ screen with a password lock. Prevent unauthorized access to your conversations and media by enabling this feature.

- Chat Message Text Input Lock: Protect your messages from prying eyes with a password-protected text input. Ensure that only authorized users can send messages from your account.

These features provide comprehensive protection for your WhatsApp™ usage, combining privacy and security seamlessly. Control access to your conversations and content with confidence, knowing that your personal data remains safe and confidential.

---
This extension does not collect information about you or your messages. Visit the privacy policy to learn more.

WhatsApp is a trademark of WhatsApp Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. This extension is an independent project developed by Fahd Chouki and has no relationship to WhatsApp or WhatsApp Inc.
